Uses of Interface
clustering.sfcm.ClusteringDelegate

Packages that use ClusteringDelegate
clustering.sfcm   
 

Uses of ClusteringDelegate in clustering.sfcm
 

Classes in clustering.sfcm that implement ClusteringDelegate
 class SFCMManager
          This class isolates the Spatial Fuzzy C-Means Algorithm (SFC) making it independent from using the ImageJ API.
 

Methods in clustering.sfcm with parameters of type ClusteringDelegate
private static java.lang.Object[] SFCM.clusterize(float[][] X, float[][] U, float[][] V, int k, double tolerance, ClusteringDelegate delegate, double m, long iterations, int stopCriterion, int r, double p, double q, int spatialFunction, int width, boolean testing)
          Clusterize is the main method that orchestrates all the steps of the Spatial Fuzzy C-Meansalgorithm.
static java.lang.Object[] SFCM.run(float[][] X, int k, double tolerance, int randomSeed, int initMode, ClusteringDelegate delegate, double m, long iterations, int stopCriterion, int r, double p, double q, int spatialFunction, int width, boolean testing)
          The only one method that is visible to the other classes, it is used for start of the algorithm: it inizializaes the matrixes U and V, run the SFCM on them and then pack them in an Object array that returns to the caller.
